text: Greg Brady (born 1971, London, Ontario, Canada) is a Canadian broadcaster. He is a host on Sportsnet 590 The FAN and is a regular talker on BBC Five Live Fighting Talk. Before he was a co-host on The Bill Watters Show on AM640 Toronto Radio. == Other websites == * AM640 Toronto Radio Page * BBC Radio 5 Live - Fighting Talk Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian radio personalities
title: Greg Brady (broadcaster)
